remarks: Finite support for a function extended by a singleton.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ funsnfsupp as of 19-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: funsnfsupOLD $p |- ( ( `' ( F u. { <. X , Y >. } ) " Z ) e. Fin <-> ( `' F " Z ) e. Fin ) $.
